transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hmm.
Customer: Haan, sir ji namaskar, Aditya baat kar raha hu, Miamart se office se. Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Haan, mai thik hu sir, aap kaise hai?
Executive: Mai bhi thik hu, mai bhi achha hu. Sir asal me maine call kiya tha, aapne sir feedback diya tha sir ki aapko IndiaMART ke jitne bhi buyleads hai woh matlab woh thik nahi aa rahi hai. Fake hai. Haan. Wrong buyleads aur inquiries aa rahi hai sir. Haan ji sir. Kisi ke liye invalid number aur switch off number aur customer se baat karta hu bolte maine inquiry ki nahi hai. Matlab hamare related customer hi nahi hai lekin uska number aa raha hai uska.
Executive: Achha. Ye ye ye kabhi [unintelligible] sir mai aapka account open kar deta hu toh woh behtar rahega baat karne me. Maine bhi delete kar diye the lekin sab.
Customer: Kya cheez? Fake inquiry jitna maine delete kar di thi, buy karke delete kar di thi.
Executive: Achha nahi nahi woh nahi matlab aapne kya IndiaMART ka app bhi delete kar diya hai?
Customer: App delete nahi kiya sir. Jaise inquiry fraud hai na toh mai usko delete kar diya. Kyuki follow up me thoda dikkat ho jati hai fir woh.
Executive: Haan haan woh toh aap sahi hai, woh toh aapke upar depend karta hai sir. Lekin agar aisa aa raha hai toh ek kaam kar sakte hai sir. Matlab ye regular basis pe ho raha hai ki kaisa reh raha hai sir?
Customer: Abhi dekho sir roz ki paanch lead aa rahi hai usme se do lead toh aise hi rehti hai.
Executive: Do aise hi rehti hai, fake rehti hai.
Customer: Ye inquiries nahi aata ya buyleads? Ek toh fake rahegi, ek toh fake rahegi ya fir aisa rahega ki nahi hum hum matlab matlab maine inquiry ki nahi thi aapne jaise call kiya hai. Abhi ek toh ladies thi ki woh bhadak gayi mere pe Hyderabad ki uska husband phone karke mere ko gaali dene lage. Ab ghar ka number kisne diya kare.
Executive: Abhi dusra customer woh haan matlab aisa ho raha hai ki aur ek customer aisa tha ki woh phone karne ke baad bolta hai galat hi galat matlab jaisa hamare Islamic ghadi aata hai toh Islamic hi customer rehte hai.
Customer: Toh baar baar wohi aate hai, wohi customer ke number aa rahe hai hamare.
Executive: Achha. Hmm. Haan sir, mai samajh gaya. Mai aapko thoda claim bhi de deta hu. Kyuki IndiaMART ke deal karte hai, digital clocks me deal karte hai na alag alag type ke. Ah, ji ji. Haan. Haan ji sir. Toh mai wohi dekh raha tha ki kya ho raha hai isme. Mainly kya hota hai jaise agar koi aisa bol raha hai toh aapne uske liye aapke aawaz me aise cut cut ke aawaz aa rahi hai beech me. Clear aawaz voice nahi aa raha.
Executive: Achha abhi abhi sahi aa raha hai? Ek second hold kijiyega mai yaha batata hu.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan haan. Abhi sahi aa raha hai sir meri voice?
Customer: Haan abhi sahi aa rahi hai voice lekin woh jo mic pe connection ke time me cut cut ki jagah pe noise aawaz aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan woh mujhe bhi sunai de raha hai sir mai bhi lekin woh like ah mere ko aapki aawaz lekin clear aa rahi hai. Toh mai bola ki isi pe continue rakhte hai. Mainly kya hai na sir aapka jo issue aa raha hai toh uske liye hum ek kaam kar sakte hai. Jo aapne feedback diya tha uske regarding kya hai ki aapke jo account manager hai present time me ah woh abhi present time me available nahi the. Toh isliye maine call kiya. Ah, main ye aapko batana chah raha hu ki agar aisa issues aa raha hai toh aap ek kaam kar sakte hai. Hum isme aapka ek group banwa deta hu thik hai sir jisme mai aur aapke jo account manager hai sab rehte hai. Agar aisa aapke paas aise issues aa rahe hai toh aap isse hum ah ek kya kehte hai feedback ke type me aap waha pe de sakte hai. Taki woh cheez ko hum on the spot resolve kar paaye. Jaise ki abhi aapne iska feedback diya sir toh woh hamare paas bhi ye thoda to be honest thoda late ho jata hai. I mean. Thik hai? Matlab ispe hume kuch work karne me thoda time lag jata hai. Kyuki abhi aapne abhi kal me aapne morning ka shayad ye de rakha hai. Haan ji. Feedback ya fir kal raat ko de rakha hai toh us aap abhi mai aapko coordinate kiya toh ye time duration ki gap jo hai isko kam karne ke liye hum waha pe woh kar sakte hai. Fir rahi baat sir inquiries ki na sir woh ye ah jo fake hame aa rahe hai. Isme baat ye ho rahi hai ki kai baar kya hota hai jo clients hota hai woh na inquiry generate kiya rehta hai lekin woh uska already deal crack ho jata hai toh woh waha pe ye keh deta hai ki ah matlab maine aise koi inquiry nahi dali thi ya fir aisa kuch hota hai. Aapko toh pata hai sir mere ah ah kya rehta hai jaise ki customer hi alag hai jaisa ki mai dekh raha hu Islamic date watch, digital clock thik hai ji. Toh waha se customer bolta hai ki maine isko inquiry ki hi nahi thi. Hmm. Achha abhi mai aapko woh keh raha hai ki inquiry hi nahi ki woh. Haan. Customer Christian ka aur hame Muslim mai dekh raha hu toh hamare Muslim hai. Toh bolta maine inquiry ki nahi thi kaise aap dekh rahe hai. Fir maine unko bataya aapka IndiaMART se number galat ho raha hai. Toh woh na kya bolta hai yaar mere ko nahi pata woh iske bare me kuch bhi. Bola aapko bhi mere sath aur bhi logo ke number se call karne lage.
Hmm hmm. Chaliye mai na ek kaam karta hu sir abhi na aapki voice jo hai bahut jyada break ho rahi hai. Thik hai? Toh mai na abhi aapse dobara ah yahi yahi number hai sir ki koi aur bhi number hai aapko? Yahi ek number hai na mujhe call karne ka? Ek aur number hai aapka sir? Yahi number hai. Abhi mai thoda aaram kar raha hu 4:00 baje ke baad call karna. Achha achha. 4:00 baje ke baad. Thik hai thik hai mai 4:00 baje ke baad aapse contact karta hu fir baat karta hu uske regarding. Thik hai? Okay okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving fake and irrelevant buyleads.

- Customers denying they made inquiries.

- Harassment and abuse from some customers.

- Voice breaking during the call.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to create a group with account manager.

- Suggested providing feedback in the group for quick resolution.

- Explained potential reasons for fake inquiries.

- Promised to call back after 4:00 PM due to voice issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after 4:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

abuse

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake inquiries, customer complaints, resolution, follow up
